turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hi! Have you ever heard of Save the Children? It's a charity!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: yes I do

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: What do you think of it?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: well, it is a charity work / organisation where they save many children

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yup! And it's an international group, and not owned/sponsored by any government.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: you're right, it is non-profit organisation.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Have you ever considered donating to them?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: it is an NGO, yes ofcourse many times I have considered to donate them as per my ability

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Me too. And I just learned today that they have partnerships that match individual donation - so every amount a person givves is actually doubled. Did you know that?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: aw, really ? No I haven't heard of it

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yes, I was really surprised too. And I learned that they focus on health first, but also prioritze education. I think that is important, as it will help the children grow up with a better chance of being successful. What do you think?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: well, I'm glad to hear such a good news from this organisation. Education is must for everyone in the world. Therefore, we could help the children for their livelihood as well as for their education.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: WHat do you think is the best way to help the kids? Education, food and water, something else?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: we can help them out their physical needs like good cloths, probably orphanage (home to stay)

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yes, I agree too! I love that Save the Children goes to a lot of places to help with things like this. And did you know that only 5% of the money the charity raises goes administration (salaries for their employees and stuff)?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: yes I do, because it is need. Administration costs, like employees salaries, office bills and other expenses can be taken from the donations & it should be 5% as you said.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yes, I think they are great. Did you know that you can donate a little of the money you are earning today to them? It can help a lot of kids - from the hungry in the US, to the children literally being killed in war zones. It would help so much.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I would love to help them a little bit (as per my ability), it will also helpful for those children to have a better life than the others.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That's amazing! I know finances are hard for everyone these days, so it is wonderful that you are willing to donate! How much would you like to give? May I suggest $.50 or even $1 if you are able?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: as per today's earning is very little I would like to donate 1

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Thank you for your help! The amount will be deducted directly from your payment and sent to Save the Children.
